original_text: And he entered again into the synagogue; and there was a man there which had a withered hand.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 회당에 들어가시니 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 거기 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And he entered again into the synagogue
and there was a man there

sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자는 마른 손을 가지고 있었다
